description:
- Managed team of 4 engineers with responsibility for 3 different product lines
 - Evaluated incoming Jira tickets to assess priority and provide time estimates for completion
 - Engineered real time notification system to allow alerting on events within active calls (ExpressJS, Redis, MongoDB)

- Lead migration and upgrade of 70+ legacy applications from various on premise data centers to multiple AWS ECS regions utilizing Docker and AWS CDK
 - Implemented standardized CI/CD practices company-wide using CircleCI
 - Aided in backend development for new product (ExpressJS, TypeScript), advancing it from Beta to GA
 - Developed custom ExpressJS application with RESTful endpoints for real-time customer updates, leveraging Redis

- Primary engineer on core web and voice processing application (PHP/JS)
 - Shipped 20+ releases upgrading customers web and voice experience with minimal service disruption
 - Contributed to AI product development on a modern stack (Python FastAPI)
 - Coordinated and ran code review meeting among team members to ensure company and industry best practices were being met in a relaxed collaborative environment

- Engineered multiple features for core voice application, integrating live with AWS DynamoDB, AWS S3, AWS Polly, and Google Dialogflow (PHP).
 - Redesigned and optimized logs database with PostgreSQL, enhancing capacity and query speed.
 - Contributed to core application upgrade from PHP5.3 to PHP7

- Designed and coded RESTful API endpoints, enhancing customer control and accelerating information retrieval for applications.
- Architected and developed custom PHP voice applications per customer specifications.
